div.class: inner col col12 first last idc3349940-6abb-48cb-8a30-717109b71805

div.div: Introducing the Play and Learn at Home initiative! During these times, the East Longmeadow Recreation Department and ELCAT are teaming up to bring our residents' additional resources to remain active. Read on...

h4.a: Deadline to License Your Dog Extended to July 1

div.div: Since the Town Hall is closed to the public and considering the Governor's Orders, the Clerk's Office is extending the deadline to license your dog to July 1. Read on...

h4.a: National Grid personalized power outage text alerts
Town Of East Longmeadow 2020 Political Calendar

div.div: The East Longmeadow Fire Department will be issuing permits for open burning on Wednesday, January 15th in accordance with Massachusetts State Regulation 310 CMR 7.07. Permits are available until Monday, May 1, 2020. Read on...
